---

## 1. DEFINITIONS

For the purposes of this Agreement:

**"Data Protection Laws"** means all applicable laws and regulations relating to the processing of Personal Data, including but not limited to:
- EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) 2016/679
- Brazil's Lei Geral de Proteção de Dados (LGPD) Law No. 13,709/2018
- California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)
- Any successor or replacement legislation

**"Personal Data"** means any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person processed under this Agreement, including but not limited to:
- Phone numbers
- Names
- Email addresses
- Conversation content
- Timestamps and metadata
- Any other data defined as personal data under Data Protection Laws

**"Processing"** means any operation performed on Personal Data, whether automated or not, including collection, recording, organization, structuring, storage, adaptation, retrieval, consultation, use, disclosure, transmission, dissemination, restriction, erasure, or destruction.

**"Data Subject"** means an identified or identifiable natural person whose Personal Data is processed.

**"Services"** means the WhatsApp-integrated AI chatbot services provided by Platform Provider, including message routing, AI-powered responses, conversation management, and related services.

**"Sub-Processor"** means any third party engaged by Platform Provider to process Personal Data on behalf of Customer.

---

## 2. SCOPE AND PURPOSE OF PROCESSING

### 2.1 Subject Matter
Platform Provider shall process Personal Data on behalf of Customer solely for the purpose of providing the Services described in the Service Agreement.

### 2.2 Duration
This Agreement shall remain in effect for the duration of the Service Agreement or until all Personal Data is deleted or returned to Customer, whichever is later.

### 2.3 Nature and Purpose of Processing
Processing activities include:
- Receiving WhatsApp messages from end users
- Routing messages to AI agents
- Generating and sending AI-powered responses
- Storing conversation history
- Managing user sessions and consent
- Detecting commercial intent (if LeadSense enabled)
- Logging and analytics for service operation

### 2.4 Categories of Data Subjects
- End users communicating via Customer's WhatsApp Business number
- Customer's employees or agents using the Admin interface

### 2.5 Types of Personal Data
- **Identifiers**: Phone numbers, names, email addresses
- **Communication Content**: WhatsApp message text, media files (images, documents)
- **Metadata**: Timestamps, message IDs, conversation IDs, session data
- **Behavioral Data**: Conversation history, opt-in/opt-out status
- **Commercial Data**: Intent signals, lead qualification scores (if applicable)

## Quick Reference

### Key Sections:
- **Section 3**: Processor obligations (security, breach notification, DPIA assistance)
- **Section 4**: Sub-processor management and authorization
- **Section 5**: International data transfers and safeguards
- **Section 6**: Data retention and secure deletion procedures
- **Section 7**: Customer obligations and legal basis
- **Section 8**: Liability, indemnification, and insurance requirements
- **Appendix A**: Technical and organizational security measures (TOM)
- **Appendix B**: Authorized sub-processor list with contacts
- **Appendix C**: Data breach notification template
- **Appendix D**: Data subject rights request form
